#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
void quickSort(int[],int,int);
int main()
{
    int t,m,c,j,a[1000000];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        j = 0;
        scanf("%d",&m);
        while(j<m)
            scanf("%d",&a[j++]);
        if(m%2==0)
             c = -1;
        else
        {
            quickSort(a,0,m-1);
            c = a[m/2];
        }
        printf("%d\n",c);
    }
    return 0;
}
void quickSort(int arr[], int left, int right) {
      int i = left, j = right;
      bool end = false;
      int tmp;
      int pivot = arr[(left + right) / 2];
      /* partition */
      while (i <= j) {
            while (arr[i] < pivot)
                  i++;
            while (arr[j] > pivot)
                  j--;
            if (i <= j) {
                  tmp = arr[i];
                  arr[i] = arr[j];
                  arr[j] = tmp;
                  i++;
                  j--;
            } 
      }   
      /* recursion */
      if (left < j){
         
            quickSort(arr, left, j);
            }
      if (i < right){
            
            quickSort(arr, i, right);
}
      if (i >= right && left >= j){
            
}}
